div.p: 据报道，这位Chatgpt-Maker希望以3400亿美元的估值筹集高达400亿美元的资金。软银将领导这一赛季，并高达250亿美元。

SoftBank also announced last week it would be investing in a $500 billion datacenter project with OpenAI called Stargate . Its been reported that OpenAI and SoftBank will each invest $19 billion in that project. SoftBank tends to fund with debt — it already carries $150 billion on its books.

a.aria-label: This mini PC with a touchpad on top should keep your fingers warm.

div.div: 这台带有触摸板顶部的迷你电脑应保持手指温暖。

div.p: For $110, the performance of the Kidwants KN1 Touch Mini PC , powered by a 2.6GHz Intel Celeron N4000 CPU, isn't going to impress you. The reason to even consider this compact PC is that it features a large touchpad built into the top of its case supporting multi-finger gestures like two-finger scrolling and pinch to zoom.这是桌子拥挤的外围少，也是一种保持至少一只手烤面包的方便方式。

a.aria-label: GoPro’s cheap Hero has some new features.

div.div: Gopro的廉价英雄有一些新功能。

div.p: Although it was overshadowed by the launch of the Hero 13 Black last September, GoPro hasn't forgotten about its smaller and cheaper $179 Hero action cam. A software update available today is introducing a new 4K 4:3 video setting that uses the sensor's full height and width. The Hero is also getting GoPro's SuperView Digital Lens option which converts 4:3 videos to 16:9 by stretching the sides of the video to create a wider effect.

a.aria-label: Y’all really do get loud during the Super Bowl.

div.div: 在超级碗期间，你们确实确实会大声。

div.p: 在研究了过去四个超级碗周日的Apple Watch噪声数据之后，我们获得了可量化的数据，表明人们在比赛前后的三个小时内和下一个星期日的表现在1.5至3分贝。是的，游戏州的人们确实比非游戏州的人们更大。我们对这些发现感到惊讶吗？不，但是要指出数据很有趣。

div.div: PS5的复古控制台主题明天就消失了，但它们会返回。

div.p: Sony sadly wasn't kidding when it said the original PlayStation, PS2, PS3, and PS4 themes for the PS5 were a limited-time thing. According to the official PlayStation account on X , the themes are being removed tomorrow, January 31st, but will return “in the months ahead.”
希望我们将获得更好的主题，这样我才能使我的PS5看起来和感觉就像PS2一样 - 减去碟片读取错误。

a.aria-label: OpenAI is putting its o1 models on Los Alamos Lab’s supercomputer.

div.div: Openai将其O1型号放在Los Alamos Lab的超级计算机上。

div.p: After announcing a partnership with OpenAI last year , the US National Laboratory will now install the company's latest reasoning models on its Nvidia-powered Venado supercomputer “to conduct national security research.”
Openai表示，它还将支持该实验室的核安全计划，“着重于降低核战争的风险，并在全球范围内保护核材料和武器：”

blockquote.p: 我们预计这种参与将导致各种化学，生物学，放射学和核（CBRN）风险进行更广泛的安全合作……我们期待共同开发未来的项目，以支持美国政府和确保AGI福利的使命全人类。
